item.title: Editable Divs
item.description: I got the idea creating a custom div element that can be edited by a client, and naively spent about an hour in React trying to make a component that swapped between a div and an input (or textarea, when I realized inputs couldn’t be multiline), with middling success. It worked, but it was pretty ugly; turns out matching fonts between inputs and divs is more complicated than simply matching CSS properties.
